scripts.android: npm run web:build -- -- --mode=embeded --minify=false && npm run android:build && npm run android:start
scripts.ios: npm run web:build -- -- --mode=embeded --minify=false && npm run ios:build && npm run ios:start
scripts.desktop: npm run web:build -- -- --mode=embeded --minify=false && npm run desktop:build && npm run desktop:start
